title: Did many musicians die with white lights in their pockets?
subtitle: There's an unprovoked rumor about pop culture that Jimmy Hendricks, Jim Morrison, Janice Joplin and Kurt Coppin all died with white lighters in their pockets.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Jimmy Hendricks, Jim Morrison, Janice Joplin, and Kurt Cobain all died with white lighters in their pockets.
